data.text: @WhiteHouse During women history month u all let @Sen_JoeManchin take away #VotingRights #abortionrights & #ChildTaxCredit mo for non filers then let him & @lisamurkowski write the #VAWA - above all things a DV woman needs so yeah NOT happy. Why r we letting a MAN take away our rights still?

@WhiteHouse @HouseDemocrats SSI hasn’t been updated in 50 YEARS. Raise SSI to The National Poverty Line  $1,132.50. The Disabled shouldn’t be living BELOW Poverty. Also send $2,000 with recurring payments to the low/fixed income during  ongoing 7.5% inflation! #DemolishDisabledPoverty

@WhiteHouse @FLOTUS @POTUS Please help and support #ErSO! invented at @UofIllinois, currently in preclinical testing for ER+ Breast Cancer. Potential cure for MBC! Killed 95-100% of cancer in animals in 3 days!! Perfect alignment w/ #CancerMoonshot initiative. Potential to save many lives!
